subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Never before had Tanaka allowed three home runs in a major league game — Victor Martinez had one and J. D. Martinez two — and the 10 hits and seven runs he allowed both tied career highs.
snippet: Never before had Tanaka allowed three home runs in a major league game — Victor Martinez had one and J. D. Martinez two — and the 10 hits and seven runs he allowed both tied career highs.
